name: aion-prediction-market
description: AION Decentralized AI Prediction Market on Polygon

scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../aion-contracts && npm install
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn server:app --reload --port 8001

author: AION Team
